summary: Completed frontend testing of new Gallery feature. All functionality working correctly: navigation, filters, lightbox, close functionality (X button and Escape key), and back navigation.
critical_code_review_comments: Gallery content is MOCKED/HARDCODED in defaultGalleryItems array - no backend API for gallery management yet
Video URLs point to customer-assets.emergentagent.com which may not have actual video files
Code is well-structured with proper data-testid attributes for testing
context_for_next_testing_agent: Gallery feature tested and working. Tests covered: Gallery button on homepage, navigation to /gallery, header and subtitle display, all 6 filter buttons (All/Photos/Videos/Food/Ambiance/Drinks), 14 gallery items display, lightbox open on click, lightbox close via X button, lightbox close via Escape key, video in lightbox display, Back to Home button, header back arrow button.

mocked_apis_list: Gallery items are hardcoded in defaultGalleryItems array in GalleryPage.jsx

gallery_page_display.subtitle_visible: PASS - 'Photos & Videos from Fin & Feathers' displayed

filter_functionality.filter_photos: PASS - Filters to image type only
filter_functionality.filter_videos: PASS - Filters to video type only (2 items)

lightbox_functionality.video_display: PASS - Video element with controls displayed in lightbox
